column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First of all I was pleasantly surprised this place is open early
column2: it makes me mad when I wake up and want ramen but I gotta wait till 5pm. Tried this place with a party of 7 and we all loved it. It took some time for us to get a table but understandable since we had a big party. I want to compliment the service
column3: from the lady behind the bar she was very nice and professional until we got seated. Our waitress was fantastic
column4: she was attentive as far as refilling our drinks timely and answering any questions we had about the menu.
